about_the_game:
**MINT VR provides high quality VR video
with VR subtitles. VR videos can be viewed in 4 different languages. You can enjoy high-quality VR moving images in real time.

1. The following languages ​​are:
-Korean
-Chinese
-English
-Japanese

2. MINT VR provides the following features for
comfortable viewing.
- High quality streaming service (4k)
- Classified video categories for easy search
- List of most latest and popular VR videos
- List of latest uploaded VR moving images
- Built in virtual user interface (UI)
- VR video player with convenient functions
